actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to estate taxes to provide that the election to use the alternate valuation date may be made on a return that is filed late.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit executors of an estate to elect the alternate valuation date for estate assets (six months after decedent's death) even though the estate tax return is filed after the due date.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to estate taxes to provide that the election to use the alternate valuation date may be made on a return that is filed late.
